thread.title: Watch Viola Davis's Impassioned Oscars Speech
thread.title_full: Watch Viola Davis's Impassioned Oscars Speech

title: Watch Viola Davis's Impassioned Oscars Speech

organizations.name: chicago movie theater patrons of chicago

hbo remy ma drops nicki minaj diss track

text:
Viola Davis, inventor of acting, finally won her Oscar. The Fences star picked up a trophy for playing Rose Maxson, the same role she won a Tony for . “I became an artist, and thank God I did, because we are the only profession who celebrates what it means to live a life,” Davis said in her acceptance speech for Best Supporting Actress. “So here’s to August Wilson who exhumed and exalted the ordinary people.” Davis also thanked Fences ’ director and star Denzel Washington, who was also nominated for Best Actor. For those keeping track at home: Davis, the most nominated actress in Oscars history, is now one Grammy away from an EGOT .
